Package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.bus

Interface EventSubscriber<E>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of event
public interface EventSubscriber<E>
A subscriber to manage Listeners.

    • unsubscribe

      boolean unsubscribe(@NotNull @NotNull SubscribedListener<E> subscribedListener)
      Unsubscribes the specified SubscribedListener.
      Parameters:
      subscribedListener - the SubscribedListener to unsubscribe
      Returns:
      if the listener has been unsubscribed, returns true, otherwise false
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this subscriber is already closed

    • unsubscribeAll

      boolean unsubscribeAll(@NotNull @NotNull Key key)
      Unsubscribes the Listeners that subscribed with the given Key.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to unsubscribe
      Returns:
      if the listeners has been unsubscribed, returns true. otherwise false
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this subscriber is already closed

    • unsubscribeIf

      boolean unsubscribeIf(@NotNull @NotNull Predicate<SubscribedListener<?>> predicate)
      Unsubscribes all listeners that satisfy the given Predicate.
      Parameters:
      predicate - a predicate which returns true for listeners to be unsubscribed
      Returns:
      if the listeners has been unsubscribed, returns true. otherwise false
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this subscriber is already closed
